articles.description: Gillingham return to action tomorrow night with manager Neil Harris struggling to pick a team after admitting "nobody deserves to play".
articles.content:
Gillingham return to action tomorrow night with manager Neil Harris struggling to pick a team after admitting "nobody deserves to play".

articles.title: Rishi Sunak is mocked after posting 'cringe-worthy' video of him putting up World Cup wallchart - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Prime Minister is seen opening a red box before circling key dates with a black marker - including those of England and Wales games.
articles.content:
Rishi Sunak has been mocked over a 'cringeworthy' video in which he has urged England and Wales to 'do us proud' while sticking a World Cup wallchart on the wall of his office.
